Package com.conversantmedia.mapreduce.io

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompositeSortKey<G extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,S extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable>  
    CompositeSortKey.CompositeSortKeyComparator<G extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,S extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable>  
    CompositeSortKey.GroupingComparator
    Comparator for grouping based on the key's partition key, natural ordering.
    CompositeSortKey.KeyPartitioner<T>
    The default partitioner for this composite key.
    CompositeSortKey.NaturalSortComparator
    Comparator for sorting the composite key based on the partition key and then the sort key.
    CompositeSortKey.ReverseSortComparator
    Comparator for sorting the composite key based on the partition key and then the sort key in reverse natural order.
    CompositeSortKeySerialization<G extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<G>,S extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<S>>
    Encapsulates the serialization functionality for a job using the CompositeSortKey key.
    CompositeSortKeySerialization.CompositeSortKeyDeserializer<G extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<G>,S extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<S>>
    Handles deserialization of the sort keys.
    CompositeSortKeySerialization.CompositeSortKeySerializer<G extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<G>,S extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<S>>
    Handles serialization of the composite sort keys.
